popover.description: This page shows all submitted jobs. Jobs are processed in order, with status updates in real-time. You can search for specific jobs by their unique ID.

popover.title: Filter by Status
popover.description: Filter jobs by their current status: Queued (waiting), Running (processing), Completed (ready for results), or Failed (check logs for errors).

popover.title: Jobs Table
popover.description: Each row shows a job with its ID, custom name (if provided), current status, submission time, and duration. Click any row to open the detailed monitoring page with live logs.

popover.title: Refresh Queue
popover.description: The queue auto-refreshes every 10 seconds. Click here for an immediate manual refresh to see the latest status updates.

popover.title: Submit New Job
popover.description: Ready to analyze more data? Click here to return to the submission page and start a new gRINN analysis.
